question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. The Vernal Equinox in the Northern Hemisphere comes around December 21-22
  2. Earth is at aphelion in its orbital path on December 22
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because the vernal (spring) equinox in the Northern Hemisphere comes around March 20-21. Earth is not at aphelion on December 22. Earth is at aphelion on 3<sup>rd</sup> or 4<sup>th</sup> July.
